name: Astral Swarm
description:
Description

"Take on endless swarms of enemy space ships using little more than your mouse or finger!

Fight formations of enemies throughout the galaxy and gain secret powerups!"

Creators

This is our second game created in our miniforge teams - our first being Lilypad Leap available here.

The challenge of our miniforge teams is to produce a game in under a month and publish it. We worked tirelessly to make it a product we are proud to present as our second release. 

We have plenty more in store for Out of the Blue Studios. Another project, Salt of the Earth: Masters of Clay, is entering the miniforge pipeline and it will be coming onto Itch.io and Google Play soon.

Made in Unity 5.6 by Out of the Blue Studios.

Your Download

Since this is a mobile game, your downloaded game will play in a small window.

We are working on a mobile release.
